citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:45am on
September 16, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee but when they knocked on the door they were
informed by a family member that the licensee was away for the day. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:45am on 
September 16, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee but when they knocked on the door they were 
informed by a family member that the licensee was away for the day. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
